name: Biathlon Battle VR
detailed_description: Biathlon Battle VR is a game dedicated to the sport called Biathlon, combining a ski race with rifle shooting. Rush on skis among snow-covered woods and mountains, participating in races and taking away gold medals. Pass the fire line, hitting with his well-aimed target shots with a variety of rifles. And all this in VR.
